name: A SWAT Assault Commando (17+) - Sniper Team Six
name_original: A SWAT Assault Commando (17+) - Sniper Team Six
description:
HEADSHOTS, BLOOD, AND GORE!
ACTION PACKED SNIPER GAME!

Absolute sniper warfare in the streets! You're a member of an elite squad of SWAT snipers whose job is to rescue a group of hostages. Will you rescue them or end up being the one who needs to be rescued?

FEATURES

- Lots of blood and gore!
- Awesome soundtrack!
- Cool sound effects!
- Simple, but engaging gameplay.
